name: Chef A
bio: Chef A is a seafood specialist who loves experimenting with different types of seafood. With over 10 years of experience in cooking seafood, Chef A is known for his/her unique and flavorful dishes that are loved by seafood enthusiasts.

recipes.name: Grilled Salmon
recipes.ingredients: salmon fillets, olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, salt, black pepper
recipes.instructions: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat, Mix olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, salt, and black pepper in a bowl, Brush the mixture onto the salmon fillets, Grill the salmon for 5-7 minutes on each side, Serve hot with a side of vegetables

recipes.name: Fish Tacos
recipes.ingredients: tilapia fillets, taco shells, cabbage, sour cream, lime, cilantro, spices
recipes.instructions: Season tilapia fillets with spices and grill until cooked through, Warm taco shells in the oven, Shred cabbage and mix with lime juice and cilantro, Fill each taco shell with grilled tilapia, cabbage slaw, and a dollop of sour cream, Serve hot

recipes.name: Fish Tacos
recipes.ingredients: tilapia fillets, taco shells, cabbage, sour cream, lime, cilantro, spices
recipes.instructions: Season tilapia fillets with spices and grill until cooked through, Warm taco shells in the oven, Shred cabbage and mix with lime juice and cilantro, Fill each taco shell with grilled tilapia, cabbage slaw, and a dollop of sour cream, Serve hot

name: Chef B
bio: Chef B is a vegetarian chef who loves creating delicious and nutritious vegetarian dishes. With over 8 years of experience in vegetarian cooking, Chef B is known for his/her innovative and flavorful dishes that are loved by vegetarians and non-vegetarians alike.

recipes.name: Vegetable Curry
recipes.ingredients: assorted vegetables, onions, garlic, ginger, spices, coconut milk, tomatoes, cilantro
recipes.instructions: Chop assorted vegetables into bite-sized pieces, Saute onions, garlic, and ginger in a pan, Add spices and cook for a minute, Add chopped vegetables, coconut milk, and tomatoes, Simmer until vegetables are cooked through, Garnish with cilantro and serve hot with rice or bread

recipes.name: Roasted Cauliflower
recipes.ingredients: cauliflower, olive oil, spices, lemon juice, parmesan cheese
recipes.instructions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F, Cut cauliflower into florets, Toss the florets with olive oil, spices, and lemon juice, Spread the florets in a single layer on a baking sheet, Roast for 20-25 minutes until tender and golden brown, Sprinkle with parmesan cheese and serve hot

recipes.name: Roasted Cauliflower
recipes.ingredients: cauliflower, olive oil, spices, lemon juice, parmesan cheese
recipes.instructions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F, Cut cauliflower into florets, Toss the florets with olive oil, spices, and lemon juice, Spread the florets in a single layer on a baking sheet, Roast for 20-25 minutes until tender and golden brown, Sprinkle with parmesan cheese and serve hot

name: Chef C
bio: Chef C is an Indian chef who loves creating authentic and delicious Indian dishes. With over 12 years of experience in Indian cooking, Chef C is known for his/her use of traditional Indian spices and techniques to create flavorful and aromatic dishes that transport you to India.

recipes.name: Butter Chicken
recipes.ingredients: chicken, yogurt, spices, tomatoes, cream, butter
recipes.instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least an hour, Grill or bake the chicken until cooked through, Saute onions and spices in butter, Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft, Add cream and cooked chicken, Simmer until the sauce thickens and chicken is coated with the sauce, Serve hot with rice or naan

recipes.name: Vegetable Biryani
recipes.ingredients: rice, assorted vegetables, spices, yogurt, raisins, cashews
recipes.instructions: Cook rice in a pot with spices and yogurt, Saute assorted vegetables in a pan, Layer the cooked rice and vegetables in a pot, Add raisins and cashews, Cover and cook until the rice is tender and the vegetables are cooked through, Serve hot with raita

recipes.name: Roasted Cauliflower
recipes.ingredients: rice, assorted vegetables, spices, yogurt, raisins, cashews

name: Chef D
bio: Chef D is an Italian chef who loves creating authentic and delicious Italian dishes. With over 15 years of experience in Italian cooking, Chef D is known for his/her use of fresh ingredients and traditional Italian techniques to create mouth-watering dishes that transport you to Italy.

name: Chef E
bio: Chef E is a Chinese chef who specializes in creating delicious and authentic Chinese dishes. name: Sumaiya chowdhury
bio: Chef F is a Thai chef who specializes in creating delicious and authentic Thai dishes. With over 8 years of experience in Thai cooking, Chef F is known for his/her use of fresh ingredients and unique blend of sweet, sour, and spicy flavors to create dishes that are both bold and refreshing.
